Messages.Author: Salsabil Elsheikh
Messages.Content: Hello, For the coming and final Lecture Series class, Prof. Wekel is asking you to read the Berlin Declaration before Friday's class (which can be found on Moodle and in the link below). So that you can discuss it in class. Please read it and prepare your questions and feedback.  https://isis.tu-berlin.de/course/view.php?id=38119#section-14 Prof. Wekel will go through the reflection papers with you on Friday, so please remember to finish and submit them before the deadline on the 11th of July at 23:59. The submission of the paper is important to pass the course.  The three students assigned the Lecture of Prof. Angela Million - Educative Spaced and Education for Sustainability for their reflection paper, if facing difficulties remembering the lecture's content, feel free to choose any other lecture. Unfortunately, we have not received the lecture materials from Prof. Million yet. Sorry for the inconvenience!  Best, BuSu team

Messages.Author: Mariam Elsheikh
Messages.Content: Dear Students,   Please remember that you will have to submit your reflection paper before the 11th of July at 23:59. Prof. Wékel would like to discuss them with you during his lecture on the 12th of July.   Best, Mariam
